reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Awareness campain to inform people on illegal migration's risks in six African countries

description.narrative: Il progetto mira ad organizzare una campagna di sensibilizzazione sui rischi e i pericoli delle migrazioni illegali, attraverso il cinema itinerante, nelle aree geografiche più afflitte da questo fenomeno. Il progetto sarà realizzato in Costa d'Avorio, Gambia, Guinea, Nigeria, Senegal e Sudan

The project aims at organising an awareness campain regarding risks and dangers of illegal migrations through itinerant cinema in some specific areas most affected by the migration phenomenon. The project will be implemented in the following countries: Ivory Coast, Gambia, Guinea, Nigeria, Senegal and Sudan

tag.narrative: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
